project.name: C-C134A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C134A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good inputs:1) environment variable is a string value with no formatting2) environement variable is a format string that doesn't expose application dataBad inputs:1) environment variable is a format string that exposes application data

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="this is a string to be printed" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C134A-WIRE-10-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF23-01-GOOD-02
